entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: The diadem is referred to as a Horcrux, an object that contains a piece of Voldemort's soul. ("But the diadem, once it became his precious Horcrux...")

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who hid the diadem in the castle. ("Voldemort must have put it there —“ — the night he asked for a job!"

entities.name: dumbledore

entities.name: gryffindor's sword
entities.description: Gryffindor's sword is mentioned as an object that Voldemort might have tried to steal. ("...then he might’ve got the chance to nick Gryﬃndor’s sword as well . . .")

entities.name: diadem
entities.description: The diadem is mentioned as an object that Voldemort hid in the castle. ("He hid the diadem in the castle, the night he asked Dumbledore to let him teach!")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who figured out where Voldemort hid the diadem. ("said Harry, ﬁnishing his thought.")
